environment_variables.RAW_FASTQ_DIR: Path to the directory containing raw FASTQ files
environment_variables.EDITED_DIR: Path to the directory for processed data
environment_variables.basePath: Path to the main fully processed data output
environment_variables.bamsPath: Path to the directory for final filtered BAM files
environment_variables.c_count: Minimum number of nonconverted Cs on a read to consider it nonconverted
environment_variables.REFERENCE_DIR: Path to the reference genome directory
environment_variables.GenomeIndex: Base name of the reference genome
environment_variables.chr_genome_size: Path to the chromosome sizes file
environment_variables.BlackList: Path to the blacklist BED file
environment_variables.picardPath: Path to the Picard JAR file
environment_variables.subScripts: Path to the directory containing sub-scripts
environment_variables.trim_r1_5prime: Number of bases to trim from the 5' end of read 1
environment_variables.trim_r1_3prime: Number of bases to trim from the 3' end of read 1
environment_variables.trim_r2_5prime: Number of bases to trim from the 5' end of read 2
environment_variables.trim_r2_3prime: Number of bases to trim from the 3' end of read 2
environment_variables.minimum_length: Minimum length of reads after trimming
environment_variables.libMetricsP: Path to the directory for library metrics files
